ModMetaData.name: Statue Of The Queen
ModMetaData.author: GeodesicDragon
ModMetaData.description:
Adds a Statue of the Queen to the art bench; when placed in a room, it increases the beauty by a substantial amount.
Requires 750 wood or stone blocks, or 7500 silver or gold.
Inspired by TheSpiffingBrit.
Rest In Peace Queen Elizabeth II (1926 - 2022)
